column5: I will be heading to Sabaskong on Sept. 21st and was wondering what the water temps are hovering at? Also, are the water levels normal, etc? Thanks for the update,Bones
Water temps are hovering between 69-71 degrees. (warm for this time of year) It's supposed to be cooling quite a bit the next few days though. Water level is probably 6" higher than the map.

Thanks for the update Obabikon. My group is looking forward to our annual trip to LOTW beginning this Saturday. I hope it is nice and chilly. I don't mind putting on the goretex. My other hope is that it is not too windy.Bones
Water temps have dropped to the mid-upper 60's (67 on average)
